players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "This is terrible! Diana's gone already. We need to work together here - has anyone noticed anything suspicious? I'm looking at everyone equally right now."

Charlie: "I agree with Bob that we need to work together. However, I also think it's important for us to be vigilant and share any suspicions we may have. I didn't see or hear anything out of the ordinary regarding Diana last night, but..."
Bob: "Alice, your silence is concerning. Charlie and I are trying to figure this out - why aren't you contributing? In a game this small, we need everyone's input."
You: "I apologize for my silence earlier, everyone. I was caught off guard by the sudden turn of events and didn't want to jump to any conclusions without enough information."

Charlie: "Let's not forget that we lost a valuable player last night. We need to focus on finding out who is responsible for Diana's death and making sure it doesn't happen again. I still believe in working together, but we must remain cautious and share..."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob

players.name: Charlie
memory: You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
